name: Chicken Driller: Can Your Drill
description:
This game is Cute little chick breaking the wall with a drill

The sequel of global hit game 'Can Your Pet'
The chick who escaped from the factory was realized the terrible truth about Chicken
And one year later ....
He found the drill of legends!
Let's save your chick friends!

- Collect a variety of the chicks!
- What can you do to get the hidden chicks?

==================================================
